title: Region change bug please help
body: On mine and my friends league clients the change region is not showing up in the shop under accounts. Has it been moved or is it just bugged right now? Please help??????????? I also checked LAN servers and they did not show them either.

replies.body:
Hey,

Is this still an issue?  
We did have region transfers disabled while handing out 2015 season rewards.  That has finished though, and the transfer options should be available again.

Let me know how you go!

Cheers
Mindstar
